snippet: Investigators returned to an elementary school in Crown Heights to continue an inquiry after a teacher’s aide, Taleek Brooks, was charged on Tuesday with producing child pornography, possibly at the school.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation agents return to Crown Heights, Brooklyn, elementary school to continue an investigation into teacher's aide Taleek Brooks; he had been released on bail on charges of possession of child pornography, but was rearrested after evidence surfaced that he may have molested children on school property.

byline.contributor: Beth Kormanik, Kate Taylor and Brian Zumhagen contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Investigators returned to an elementary school in Crown Heights to continue an inquiry after a teacher’s aide, Taleek Brooks, was charged on Tuesday with producing child pornography, possibly at the school.

headline.seo: F.B.I. Seeks Victims of School Aide Accused of Sex Abuse
headline.main: F.B.I. Seeks More Abuse Victims at School
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Seeks More Abuse Victims at School
